String.Source: Nuka-Cola Museum?
String.Dest: Nuka-Cola Museum?

String.Source: It's Impressive
String.Dest: Je to působivé

String.Source: Nothing Special
String.Dest: Nic zvláštního

String.Source: I Don't Like Nuka-Cola
String.Dest: I Don't Like Nuka-Cola

String.Source: Never Heard of It
String.Dest: Never Heard of It

String.Source: How So?
String.Dest: Jak to?

String.Source: Of Course (Lie)
String.Dest: Of Course (Lie)

String.Source: Not at All
String.Dest: Vůbec ne

String.Source: Sarcastic
String.Dest: Sarkasticky

String.Source: General Braxton?
String.Dest: Generál Braxton?

String.Source: You Got Suckered
String.Dest: You Got Suckered

String.Source: Sarcastic
String.Dest: Sarkasticky

String.Source: What's Next?
String.Dest: Co dál?

String.Source: I'm Truly Sorry
String.Dest: Opravdu mě to mrzí

String.Source: Demand Payment
String.Dest: Demand Payment

String.Source: I Won the Contest
String.Dest: I Won the Contest

String.Source: I'm With Sierra
String.Dest: I'm With Sierra

String.Source: This is a Joke
String.Dest: This is a Joke

String.Source: What Happened to You?
String.Dest: Co se ti stalo?

String.Source: It's An Amusement Park
String.Dest: It's An Amusement Park

String.Source: Accept Sierra's Offer
String.Dest: Accept Sierra's Offer

String.Source: I'm Shutting Off The Power
String.Dest: I'm Shutting Off The Power

String.Source: I Haven't Decided
String.Dest: Ještě nevím

String.Source: Still Want the Formula?
String.Dest: Stále chceš recepturu?

String.Source: You're Welcome
String.Dest: Není zač

String.Source: This Has Been Interesting
String.Dest: This Has Been Interesting

String.Source: Going To Use The Formula?
String.Dest: Použiješ recepturu?

String.Source: Thank Me With caps
String.Dest: Děkuji za zátky

String.Source: Make Me an Offer
String.Dest: Make Me an Offer

String.Source: You Can Trust Me
String.Dest: You Can Trust Me

String.Source: I Know That Name
String.Dest: I Know That Name

String.Source: Don't Have Time
String.Dest: Nemám čas

String.Source: I Love That Idea
String.Dest: I Love That Idea

String.Source: No Thanks
String.Dest: Ne, díky

String.Source: Not Worth the Trouble
String.Dest: Not Worth the Trouble

String.Source: Who's He?
String.Dest: Who's He?

String.Source: Anything I Can Do?
String.Dest: Můžu něco udělat?

String.Source: Yeah, Whatever
String.Dest: Yeah, Whatever

String.Source: Sarcastic
String.Dest: Sarkasticky

String.Source: Where Should I Look?
String.Dest: Where Should I Look?

String.Source: I Can Help
String.Dest: Pomůžu

String.Source: I'll Help You
String.Dest: Pomůžu ti

String.Source: I'll Find It
String.Dest: Najdu ho

String.Source: Give Nuka-Cola Quartz
String.Dest: Give Nuka-Cola Quartz

String.Source: Get to the Point
String.Dest: Řekni, o co jde

String.Source: Suit Yourself
String.Dest: Suit Yourself

String.Source: What's My Reward?
String.Dest: What's My Reward?

String.Source: Sounds Boring
String.Dest: Sounds Boring

String.Source: What Kind of Tour?
String.Dest: What Kind of Tour?

String.Source: Search for What?
String.Dest: Search for What?

String.Source: Sarcastic
String.Dest: Sarkasticky

String.Source: That Sounds Difficult
String.Dest: That Sounds Difficult

String.Source: Fellow Nuka-Cola Fan
String.Dest: Fellow Nuka-Cola Fan

String.Source: Purpose of Your Visit?
String.Dest: Purpose of Your Visit?

String.Source: Very Informative
String.Dest: Very Informative

String.Source: Start Talking
String.Dest: Začni mluvit

String.Source: Did That From Memory?
String.Dest: Did That From Memory?

String.Source: Good Point
String.Dest: Good Point

String.Source: I Want That Prototype
String.Dest: I Want That Prototype

String.Source: Not Happening
String.Dest: Ani náhodou

String.Source: What's In It For Me?
String.Dest: A co z toho budu mít já?

String.Source: I'll Shut Off the Power
String.Dest: I'll Shut Off the Power

String.Source: If Sierra Stays With You?
String.Dest: If Sierra Stays With You?

String.Source: Haven't Decided Yet
String.Dest: Haven't Decided Yet

String.Source: I'm Accepting Sierra's Offer
String.Dest: I'm Accepting Sierra's Offer

String.Source: I Set Him Free
String.Dest: I Set Him Free

String.Source: That Sounds Extreme
String.Dest: That Sounds Extreme

String.Source: I Can Sympathize
String.Dest: I Can Sympathize

String.Source: What Was Best For Him?
String.Dest: What Was Best For Him?

String.Source: You're Being Selfish
String.Dest: You're Being Selfish

String.Source: It Was His Choice
String.Dest: It Was His Choice

String.Source: Sarcastic
String.Dest: Sarkasticky

String.Source: Are You Sure?
String.Dest: Určitě?

String.Source: It sure is!
String.Dest: It sure is!

String.Source: Any minute now, I'm going to spot that thing.
String.Dest: Any minute now, I'm going to spot that thing.

String.Source: A colorful junkyard is still a junkyard.
String.Dest: Barevné smetiště je stále smetiště.

String.Source: Maybe you've heard about my Nuka-Cola Museum?
String.Dest: Maybe you've heard about my Nuka-Cola Museum?

String.Source: It's got to be around here somewhere...
String.Dest: It's got to be around here somewhere...

String.Source: What?! Really?
String.Dest: What?! Really?

String.Source: It's all on display at my home in a settlement called Girdershade. I give tours to anyone who stops by.
String.Dest: It's all on display at my home in a settlement called Girdershade. I give tours to anyone who stops by.

String.Source: You've just made my day. Here, let me return the favor. It's not really cold any more, but I'm sure it still tastes great!
String.Dest: You've just made my day. Here, let me return the favor. It's not really cold any more, but I'm sure it still tastes great!

String.Source: Damn, they hid this thing pretty well.
String.Dest: Damn, they hid this thing pretty well.

String.Source: I don't like Nuka-Cola. Too sweet.
String.Dest: I don't like Nuka-Cola. Too sweet.

String.Source: Well, it's a long way from here, so I guess that's not surprising.
String.Dest: Well, it's a long way from here, so I guess that's not surprising.

String.Source: How is this place amazing?
String.Dest: How is this place amazing?

String.Source: Sooner or later, Cappy, I'm going to find you...
String.Dest: Sooner or later, Cappy, I'm going to find you...

String.Source: Alright, alright, so it's not that well known. Thanks for trying to spare my feelings, anyway.
String.Dest: Alright, alright, so it's not that well known. Thanks for trying to spare my feelings, anyway.

String.Source: Nope, never heard of it.
String.Dest: Nope, never heard of it.

String.Source: It's close... I know it's close. Has to be.
String.Dest: It's close... I know it's close. Has to be.

String.Source: Really? That's great! I'm so glad word is catching on. Maybe I'll get more visitors soon.
String.Dest: Really? That's great! I'm so glad word is catching on. Maybe I'll get more visitors soon.

String.Source: Doesn't seem all that special to me.
String.Dest: Doesn't seem all that special to me.

String.Source: Absolutely! I've spent years collecting all the Nuka-Cola merchandise I could find.
String.Dest: Absolutely! I've spent years collecting all the Nuka-Cola merchandise I could find.

String.Source: Yeah, I guess it is pretty impressive.
String.Dest: Yeah, I guess it is pretty impressive.

String.Source: Got to keep searching... can't give up now.
String.Dest: Got to keep searching... can't give up now.

String.Source: A junkyard? Are you crazy! Just look around!
String.Dest: Smetiště? Jsi blázen! Stačí se tu jen tak porozhlédnout!

String.Source: The name's Sierra Petrovita.
String.Dest: Jmenuji se Sierra Petrovitová.

String.Source: I can't imagine how anyone couldn't like Nuka-Cola! I think it's the best drink ever invented, and I love every flavor.
String.Dest: I can't imagine how anyone couldn't like Nuka-Cola! I think it's the best drink ever invented, and I love every flavor.

String.Source: You run a Nuka-Cola Museum?
String.Dest: You run a Nuka-Cola Museum?

String.Source: Uh, yeah, the Nuka-Cola Museum. Everyone's heard of that.
String.Dest: Uh, yeah, the Nuka-Cola Museum. Everyone's heard of that.

String.Source: What?! You can't be serious. This is the most special place in the world.
String.Dest: What?! You can't be serious. This is the most special place in the world.

String.Source: Come on, you clever little Cappy. Show yourself...
String.Dest: Come on, you clever little Cappy. Show yourself...

String.Source: And that's another clue.
String.Dest: And that's another clue.

String.Source: Remember, you won't see the Hidden Cappy codes without the glasses. Make sure you're wearing them while you search.
String.Dest: Remember, you won't see the Hidden Cappy codes without the glasses. Make sure you're wearing them while you search.

String.Source: Keep those eyes peeled! Those Cappys could be pretty well-hidden.
String.Dest: Keep those eyes peeled! Those Cappys could be pretty well-hidden.

String.Source: Aha. Got another one.
String.Dest: Aha. Got another one.

String.Source: That's three clues. The letters must spell something.
String.Dest: That's three clues. The letters must spell something.

String.Source: Happy hunting!
String.Dest: Happy hunting!

String.Source: Two clues down, eight to go.
String.Dest: Two clues down, eight to go.

String.Source: That's one.
String.Dest: That's one.

String.Source: And that's all ten clues. Better get these back to Sierra and see what she can make of them.
String.Dest: And that's all ten clues. Better get these back to Sierra and see what she can make of them.

String.Source: Eight clues. Almost done.
String.Dest: Eight clues. Almost done.

String.Source: That's clue number nine. One left.
String.Dest: That's clue number nine. One left.

String.Source: Clue number seven.
String.Dest: Clue number seven.

String.Source: Okay, that's another clue found.
String.Dest: Okay, that's another clue found.

String.Source: Here's hoping they didn't hide the Cappys too well.
String.Dest: Here's hoping they didn't hide the Cappys too well.

String.Source: Careful out there. The park's a pretty dangerous place.
String.Dest: Careful out there. The park's a pretty dangerous place.

String.Source: I found all of the Hidden Cappys. Each one had a letter.
String.Dest: I found all of the Hidden Cappys. Each one had a letter.

String.Source: Yep, I've been looking over the clues you brought me.
String.Dest: Yep, I've been looking over the clues you brought me.

String.Source: Great! Let me take a look at these letters.
String.Dest: Great! Let me take a look at these letters.

String.Source: That was before I became this monster. Before I was trapped here for centuries to suffer in solitude.
String.Dest: That was before I became this monster. Before I was trapped here for centuries to suffer in solitude.

String.Source: This whole thing is Sierra's idea. She came here to solve your Hidden Cappy contest.
String.Dest: This whole thing is Sierra's idea. She came here to solve your Hidden Cappy contest.

String.Source: Smart enough to invent Nuka-Cola, but you still fell for that?
String.Dest: Smart enough to invent Nuka-Cola, but you still fell for that?

String.Source: Who was General Braxton?
String.Dest: Who was General Braxton?

String.Source: It was going to be a quantum-enhanced variant of the standard portable tactical warhead.
String.Dest: Tohle bude vylepšená kvantová varianta standardní přenosné taktické bojové hlavice.

String.Source: It's... simpler than I was expecting.
String.Dest: It's... simpler than I was expecting.

String.Source: He was one of the top men in the Army Research Laboratory's Weapons and Materials division.
String.Dest: He was one of the top men in the Army Research Laboratory's Weapons and Materials division.

String.Source: You did all the work looking for the Hidden Cappys, so you should be the one who gets to enter the code.
String.Dest: You did all the work looking for the Hidden Cappys, so you should be the one who gets to enter the code.

String.Source: Hold on. We haven't got into Bradberton's office yet. That was the deal, remember?
String.Dest: Hold on. We haven't got into Bradberton's office yet. That was the deal, remember?

String.Source: This door should lead to Bradberton's office, but it's locked up tight. The keypad is the only way to open it.
String.Dest: This door should lead to Bradberton's office, but it's locked up tight. The keypad is the only way to open it.

String.Source: Of course it's simple. The contest was meant for kids.
String.Dest: Of course it's simple. The contest was meant for kids.

String.Source: I got your code, now you owe me. Pay up.
String.Dest: I got your code, now you owe me. Pay up.

String.Source: Well damn, I was sure the letters spelled "fresh ginger." That stuff is great in hot tea with honey, lemon, a little brandy... a lot of brandy...
String.Dest: Well damn, I was sure the letters spelled "fresh ginger." That stuff is great in hot tea with honey, lemon, a little brandy... a lot of brandy...

String.Source: You trespass in my private vault in my office in my amusement park, and you have the gall to treat me like some joke?
String.Dest: You trespass in my private vault in my office in my amusement park, and you have the gall to treat me like some joke?

String.Source: Just hang in there a little bit longer. Payment's coming, I promise.
String.Dest: Just hang in there a little bit longer. Payment's coming, I promise.

String.Source: I can't imagine what you must have gone through. I'm truly sorry, Mister Bradberton.
String.Dest: I can't imagine what you must have gone through. I'm truly sorry, Mister Bradberton.

String.Source: Nice try, but you'd be one "g" short, so let's just assume it's "refreshing."
String.Dest: Nice try, but you'd be one "g" short, so let's just assume it's "refreshing."

String.Source: The Hidden Cappy contest... it all seems so long ago. Another lifetime.
String.Dest: The Hidden Cappy contest... it all seems so long ago. Another lifetime.

String.Source: We used the contest code to get in. What the hell happened to you?
String.Dest: We used the contest code to get in. What the hell happened to you?

String.Source: Oh yeah! I forgot about that. I guess sometimes I just take all this Nuka-Cola stuff so seriously!
String.Dest: Oh yeah! I forgot about that. I guess sometimes I just take all this Nuka-Cola stuff so seriously!

String.Source: So how do we use this code?
String.Dest: So how do we use this code?

String.Source: We solved your Hidden Cappy contest.
String.Dest: We solved your Hidden Cappy contest.

String.Source: This has to be a joke.
String.Dest: This has to be a joke.

String.Source: This was General Braxton's plan all along. Damn the man!
String.Dest: This was General Braxton's plan all along. Damn the man!

String.Source: You don't think I know that? You don't think I've contemplated my folly for decades on end?
String.Dest: You don't think I know that? You don't think I've contemplated my folly for decades on end?

String.Source: Yes, make your jokes, but I've still accomplished ten times more in a single lifetime than anyone I've met, including you!
String.Dest: Yes, make your jokes, but I've still accomplished ten times more in a single lifetime than anyone I've met, including you!

String.Source: Well, anyone who's stared at Nuka-Cola merchandise as long as I have would get this one pretty fast. The letters definitely spell "Refreshing."
String.Dest: Well, anyone who's stared at Nuka-Cola merchandise as long as I have would get this one pretty fast. The letters definitely spell "Refreshing."

String.Source: When something sounds too good to be true, it usually is.
String.Dest: When something sounds too good to be true, it usually is.

String.Source: A... a weapon? I don't believe it. Why would the genius who brought so much joy to the world want to make something destructive?
String.Dest: A... a weapon? I don't believe it. Why would the genius who brought so much joy to the world want to make something destructive?

String.Source: I guess we just need to key in the 10 numbers that correspond to the word "refreshing."
String.Dest: I guess we just need to key in the 10 numbers that correspond to the word "refreshing."

String.Source: In fact, the prototypes are stored in this very chamber. You can have them, on one condition.
String.Dest: In fact, the prototypes are stored in this very chamber. You can have them, on one condition.

String.Source: No deal. I want that prototype, and I'm going to get it.
String.Dest: No deal. I want that prototype, and I'm going to get it.

String.Source: I'll accept your offer. I won't shut the power off.
String.Dest: I'll accept your offer. I won't shut the power off.

String.Source: You really want to condemn one of the greatest minds of his generation to die, even though I've offered you a better option?
String.Dest: You really want to condemn one of the greatest minds of his generation to die, even though I've offered you a better option?

String.Source: You there, with the Pip-Boy. What are you doing here?
String.Dest: You there, with the Pip-Boy. What are you doing here?

String.Source: This is like walking through history.
String.Dest: This is like walking through history.

String.Source: What about the secret Nuka-Cola formula you think is locked up in that vault?
String.Dest: A ty si myslíš, že tajemství receptury na Nuka-Colu je uzavřené v tom vaultu?

String.Source: And just so you can get your hands on a weapon? Guess I didn't realize you were so cold-hearted and selfish.
String.Dest: And just so you can get your hands on a weapon? Guess I didn't realize you were so cold-hearted and selfish.

String.Source: Fine, then. Destroy one of our... our national treasures!
String.Dest: Fine, then. Destroy one of our... our national treasures!

String.Source: Thank you, thank you, thank you! You're doing the right thing. After all, this is a great man we're talking about.
String.Dest: Thank you, thank you, thank you! You're doing the right thing. After all, this is a great man we're talking about.

String.Source: Wish I could have been here before the war. You know, just to see what it was like.
String.Dest: Wish I could have been here before the war. You know, just to see what it was like.

String.Source: Well, I do have one thing that might interest you.
String.Dest: Well, I do have one thing that might interest you.

String.Source: Now if you'll excuse me, I have a living legend to talk to. Good luck running Nuka-World!
String.Dest: Now if you'll excuse me, I have a living legend to talk to. Good luck running Nuka-World!

String.Source: Wow! This is amazing.
String.Dest: Wow! This is amazing.

String.Source: Just look at this place.
String.Dest: Just look at this place.

String.Source: I'm still thinking about it.
String.Dest: I'm still thinking about it.

String.Source: It's hard to believe I'm really here.
String.Dest: It's hard to believe I'm really here.

String.Source: A mercenary to the end, huh? I guess you've earned it.
String.Dest: A mercenary to the end, huh? I guess you've earned it.

String.Source: So it really was here. I'm grateful, but don't think this means I've forgiven you.
String.Dest: So it really was here. I'm grateful, but don't think this means I've forgiven you.

String.Source: By the time I'm done, I'm going to need a much bigger building to house my Nuka-Cola museum!
String.Dest: By the time I'm done, I'm going to need a much bigger building to house my Nuka-Cola museum!

String.Source: It's been an... interesting experience.
String.Dest: It's been an... interesting experience.

String.Source: If you really want to thank me, thank me with caps.
String.Dest: Pokud mi opravdu chceš poděkovat, poděkuj mi zátkami.

String.Source: I know, I know, but I have something else that I can offer you instead. At least hear me out.
String.Dest: I know, I know, but I have something else that I can offer you instead. At least hear me out.

String.Source: You're welcome.
String.Dest: Není zač.

String.Source: For both of us.
String.Dest: For both of us.

String.Source: I think I'll stick around here for awhile and see what else I can find.
String.Dest: I think I'll stick around here for awhile and see what else I can find.

String.Source: Who knows? Maybe he'll tell me the Nuka-Cola formula himself, along with all kinds of other things! That would be incredible!
String.Dest: Kdo ví? Možná, že mi tu recepturu na Nuka-Colu řekne sám, spolu se všemi dalšími možnými věcmi! To by bylo neuvěřitelné!

String.Source: That was before we found John-Caleb Bradberton, in the flesh! Well, mostly.
String.Dest: That was before we found John-Caleb Bradberton, in the flesh! Well, mostly.

String.Source: Please, tell me that you'll let him live.
String.Dest: Please, tell me that you'll let him live.

String.Source: Wait! Don't do it! I have a better idea. I think I have a way we can all win here.
String.Dest: Wait! Don't do it! I have a better idea. I think I have a way we can all win here.

String.Source: Here. I know it's not much, but you really went above and beyond the call of duty.
String.Dest: Here. I know it's not much, but you really went above and beyond the call of duty.

String.Source: If that fails, well, I've still got a new centerpiece for my collection.
String.Dest: If that fails, well, I've still got a new centerpiece for my collection.

String.Source: You killed the man who was my greatest hero, a man who revolutionized the soft drink industry and whose creations put smiles on a million faces.
String.Dest: You killed the man who was my greatest hero, a man who revolutionized the soft drink industry and whose creations put smiles on a million faces.

String.Source: Now that you've got the formula for Nuka-Cola, what are you going to do with it?
String.Dest: Nyní, když máš recepturu na Nuka-Colu, co s ní teď budeš dělat?

String.Source: I'm not a chemist, but I might try to brew some up, just for fun.
String.Dest: I'm not a chemist, but I might try to brew some up, just for fun.

String.Source: You wanted the Nuka-Cola formula? Here it is.
String.Dest: Chtěla jsi recepturu na Nuka-Colu? Tady to je.

String.Source: And I can promise you this - you won't find another collection like mine in the Capital Wasteland, the Commonwealth, or any place else!
String.Dest: And I can promise you this - you won't find another collection like mine in the Capital Wasteland, the Commonwealth, or any place else!

String.Source: Oh, you guys are real friendly, aren't you?
String.Dest: Oh, you guys are real friendly, aren't you?

String.Source: I'm not here for the market! I didn't travel hundreds of miles to go shopping.
String.Dest: I'm not here for the market! I didn't travel hundreds of miles to go shopping.

String.Source: I don't suppose you came here for a bullet in the brain either, so if you want to live, I suggest you stay where you belong.
String.Dest: I don't suppose you came here for a bullet in the brain either, so if you want to live, I suggest you stay where you belong.

String.Source: How? Just look around! Don't you see it?
String.Dest: How? Just look around! Don't you see it?

String.Source: I thought we told you to keep your ass in the market. If you're looking for something, you can find it there like everyone else.
String.Dest: I thought we told you to keep your ass in the market. If you're looking for something, you can find it there like everyone else.

String.Source: You can just imagine the children, smiling and happy, all drinking Nuka-Cola and having the time of their lives. It must have been magical.
String.Dest: You can just imagine the children, smiling and happy, all drinking Nuka-Cola and having the time of their lives. It must have been magical.

String.Source: You haven't seen anything that's, um, out of the ordinary around here, have you? Maybe something hidden? Shaped like a bottlecap?
String.Dest: You haven't seen anything that's, um, out of the ordinary around here, have you? Maybe something hidden? Shaped like a bottlecap?

String.Source: Well I'm betting that somewhere in his office is the Original Nuka-Cola Formula!
String.Dest: No já sázím, že někde v jeho kancelářích je původní receptura na Nuka-Colu!

String.Source: Well, okay. To be honest I'm so excited I can barely keep it in! It'll be a relief to finally tell someone.
String.Dest: Well, okay. To be honest I'm so excited I can barely keep it in! It'll be a relief to finally tell someone.

String.Source: Sure, why not? Might learn more about the park while I'm at it.
String.Dest: Sure, why not? Might learn more about the park while I'm at it.

String.Source: If you're searching for a more ridiculous pair of sunglasses, don't bother. I doubt such a thing exists.
String.Dest: If you're searching for a more ridiculous pair of sunglasses, don't bother. I doubt such a thing exists.

String.Source: Wow! That's amazing! Thank you!
String.Dest: Wow! That's amazing! Thank you!

String.Source: But these aren't just ordinary sunglasses. They were part of a really cool contest that started just before the war.
String.Dest: But these aren't just ordinary sunglasses. They were part of a really cool contest that started just before the war.

String.Source: Just track down the clues and then come back to me once you've found them all.
String.Dest: Just track down the clues and then come back to me once you've found them all.

String.Source: What?! Boring? If you were really a fellow Nuka-Cola fan, you'd want to hear what I have to say.
String.Dest: What?! Boring? If you were really a fellow Nuka-Cola fan, you'd want to hear what I have to say.

String.Source: With its brightly-colored design and delicious burgers and fries, it's no surprise Cappy's Cafe was hugely popular with kids.
String.Dest: With its brightly-colored design and delicious burgers and fries, it's no surprise Cappy's Cafe was hugely popular with kids.

String.Source: I'm not about to scour this park looking for a rare flavor of Nuka-Cola.
String.Dest: I'm not about to scour this park looking for a rare flavor of Nuka-Cola.

String.Source: Suit yourself.
String.Dest: Posluž si.

String.Source: What are you searching for?
String.Dest: What are you searching for?

String.Source: I was just getting to that part.
String.Dest: I was just getting to that part.

String.Source: Sorry, I tend to forget most people aren't as interested in the history of Nuka-Cola as I am.
String.Dest: Sorry, I tend to forget most people aren't as interested in the history of Nuka-Cola as I am.

String.Source: Now, I know what you're thinking. Bradberton's long gone, who cares about the contest anymore?
String.Dest: Now, I know what you're thinking. Bradberton's long gone, who cares about the contest anymore?

String.Source: Good point! You're new here, after all. You should learn everything you can.
String.Dest: Good point! You're new here, after all. You should learn everything you can.

String.Source: I'll keep your secret. You can trust me.
String.Dest: I'll keep your secret. You can trust me.

String.Source: I guess you could think of me as the world's biggest Nuka-Cola fan. I've been obsessed with the stuff since the first time I tasted it.
String.Dest: I guess you could think of me as the world's biggest Nuka-Cola fan. I've been obsessed with the stuff since the first time I tasted it.

String.Source: Not all of the attractions at Nuka-World were rides. The Nuka-Cade here boasted dozens of exciting games of skill for the whole family to enjoy.
String.Dest: Not all of the attractions at Nuka-World were rides. The Nuka-Cade here boasted dozens of exciting games of skill for the whole family to enjoy.

String.Source: If you could bring me a bottle, then I'd be happy to share my secret with you.
String.Dest: If you could bring me a bottle, then I'd be happy to share my secret with you.

String.Source: Right this way, if you please!
String.Dest: Right this way, if you please!

String.Source: Sounds like a lot more trouble than it's worth.
String.Dest: Sounds like a lot more trouble than it's worth.

String.Source: Oh, no thanks. I kind of need to keep this a secret. It's really important to me and I just don't know you very well.
String.Dest: Oh, no thanks. I kind of need to keep this a secret. It's really important to me and I just don't know you very well.

String.Source: I'm an expert on all things Nuka-Cola, so I'm sure I'll be able to decipher it.
String.Dest: I'm an expert on all things Nuka-Cola, so I'm sure I'll be able to decipher it.

String.Source: Each image has part of a code or something, and only these special glasses can reveal it.
String.Dest: Each image has part of a code or something, and only these special glasses can reveal it.

String.Source: Okay, okay. Sorry, it's hard not to get carried away. I mean I'm standing in Nuka-World!
String.Dest: Okay, okay. Sorry, it's hard not to get carried away. I mean I'm standing in Nuka-World!

String.Source: Oh boy! John-Caleb Bradberton! How exciting!
String.Dest: Oh boy! John-Caleb Bradberton! How exciting!

String.Source: Just get to the point.
String.Dest: Just get to the point.

String.Source: I could help you out, if you want.
String.Dest: I could help you out, if you want.

String.Source: He was an inventor, and the best thing he ever invented was... you guessed it! Nuka-Cola!
String.Dest: He was an inventor, and the best thing he ever invented was... you guessed it! Nuka-Cola!

String.Source: So to win the contest, you had to find ten images of Cappy, the Nuka-Cola mascot, hidden throughout the park.
String.Dest: So to win the contest, you had to find ten images of Cappy, the Nuka-Cola mascot, hidden throughout the park.

String.Source: Bradberton... I remember that name. He was the guy who invented Nuka-Cola, right?
String.Dest: Bradberton... I remember that name. He was the guy who invented Nuka-Cola, right?

String.Source: Nuka-World! I've always dreamed of coming here, and now I've finally made it. This place is amazing, don't you think?
String.Dest: Nuka-World! I've always dreamed of coming here, and now I've finally made it. This place is amazing, don't you think?

String.Source: Are you sure? Is there anything I can do to change your mind?
String.Dest: Are you sure? Is there anything I can do to change your mind?

String.Source: Great! I can't wait to taste it again. It's a really unique flavor.
String.Dest: Great! I can't wait to taste it again. It's a really unique flavor.

String.Source: You'd better make good on that promise. I'm not running a charity out here, you know.
String.Dest: You'd better make good on that promise. I'm not running a charity out here, you know.

String.Source: Sounds interesting, but I don't really have time for that right now.
String.Dest: Sounds interesting, but I don't really have time for that right now.

String.Source: Of course. There's a little bit more to the story, and this is the part I think you'll like.
String.Dest: Of course. There's a little bit more to the story, and this is the part I think you'll like.

String.Source: What's in it for me?
String.Dest: A co z toho budu mít já?

String.Source: I know, but there's more to the story. Just hear me out.
String.Dest: I know, but there's more to the story. Just hear me out.

String.Source: Those seeking a more refined experience could sit down to a sumptuous meal at the Parlor Dinner Theater, home to the renowned Nuka-World Players.
String.Dest: Ty, kteří hledají vytříbenější zkušenosti si mohou posedět na bohaté večeři v Salónku Jídelní kabaret, domově pro renomované hráče Nuka-Worldu.

String.Source: I'll let you know when I've found a bottle of Nuka-Cola Quartz.
String.Dest: I'll let you know when I've found a bottle of Nuka-Cola Quartz.

String.Source: Fizztop Mountain here provides a commanding view of Nuka-Town U.S.A. and the other areas of the park.
String.Dest: Fizztop Mountain here provides a commanding view of Nuka-Town U.S.A. and the other areas of the park.

String.Source: Hmm. Well, there is something. There's a particular flavor of Nuka-Cola that I haven't had in a really long time.
String.Dest: Hmm. Well, there is something. There's a particular flavor of Nuka-Cola that I haven't had in a really long time.

String.Source: Past the market is Nuka-World's front gate, which led to this entrance plaza.
String.Dest: Past the market is Nuka-World's front gate, which led to this entrance plaza.

String.Source: Well, I'd stay and chat some more, but I've got to get back to my search.
String.Dest: Well, I'd stay and chat some more, but I've got to get back to my search.

String.Source: I know! That's exactly how I felt when I first learned about the contest. It's so nice to meet someone who really understands.
String.Dest: I know! That's exactly how I felt when I first learned about the contest. It's so nice to meet someone who really understands.

String.Source: That sounds incredibly boring.
String.Dest: That sounds incredibly boring.

String.Source: Okay! So as promised, I'll tell you why I'm here.
String.Dest: Okay! So as promised, I'll tell you why I'm here.

String.Source: The winner of the contest would get to meet the famous John-Caleb Bradberton himself!
String.Dest: The winner of the contest would get to meet the famous John-Caleb Bradberton himself!

String.Source: Sure, whatever. You have fun with that.
String.Dest: Sure, whatever. You have fun with that.

String.Source: Okay!
String.Dest: Oukej!

String.Source: Who was John-Caleb Bradberton?
String.Dest: Who was John-Caleb Bradberton?

String.Source: It's called Nuka-Cola Quartz. It glows white in the bottle. You can't miss it.
String.Dest: It's called Nuka-Cola Quartz. It glows white in the bottle. You can't miss it.

String.Source: I'll give you my Cappy Glasses and this old contest holotape. It's got hints about where to find the Hidden Cappys.
String.Dest: I'll give you my Cappy Glasses and this old contest holotape. It's got hints about where to find the Hidden Cappys.

String.Source: Okay! Then let's get started!
String.Dest: Okay! Then let's get started!

String.Source: Finding a rare blend of Nuka-Cola in this place could take a pretty long time.
String.Dest: Nalezení vzácné směsi Nuka-Coly na tomto místě může trvat velmi dlouhou dobu.

String.Source: Sounds like a great idea!
String.Dest: Sounds like a great idea!

String.Source: I collect all the merchandise I can find, like these awesome Cappy Glasses I'm wearing.
String.Dest: I collect all the merchandise I can find, like these awesome Cappy Glasses I'm wearing.

String.Source: Exactly! Wow, not a lot of people know that. At least not anymore.
String.Dest: Exactly! Wow, not a lot of people know that. At least not anymore.

String.Source: Will do! And you have fun doing... uh... whatever you do around here.
String.Dest: Will do! And you have fun doing... uh... whatever you do around here.

String.Source: What do you have in mind, exactly?
String.Dest: What do you have in mind, exactly?

String.Source: Got it right here. Enjoy.
String.Dest: Got it right here. Enjoy.

String.Source: Any idea where I should look for this stuff?
String.Dest: Any idea where I should look for this stuff?

String.Source: And that concludes the tour! Pretty good, huh?
String.Dest: And that concludes the tour! Pretty good, huh?

String.Source: Happy hunting!
String.Dest: Happy hunting!

String.Source: Well, I'll get back to my search, then.
String.Dest: Well, I'll get back to my search, then.

String.Source: Maybe. Or maybe not! Who knows? Anyway, you asked me if I would change my mind, and that's what I want.
String.Dest: Maybe. Or maybe not! Who knows? Anyway, you asked me if I would change my mind, and that's what I want.

String.Source: Sunglasses? Oh! You mean the Cappy glasses! Sorry, sometimes I forget I'm even wearing them.
String.Dest: Sunglasses? Oh! You mean the Cappy glasses! Sorry, sometimes I forget I'm even wearing them.

String.Source: I'm a fellow Nuka-Cola fan, so you can definitely trust me.
String.Dest: I'm a fellow Nuka-Cola fan, so you can definitely trust me.

String.Source: I've read all kinds of things about the park, and I'd love to tell someone about it.
String.Dest: I've read all kinds of things about the park, and I'd love to tell someone about it.

String.Source: Oh... I shouldn't have said that. You know what? Never mind. I'll just keep looking.
String.Dest: Oh... I shouldn't have said that. You know what? Never mind. I'll just keep looking.

String.Source: Well, I'm glad you asked! I like to think of myself as one of the foremost authorities on the subject of Nuka-World.
String.Dest: Well, I'm glad you asked! I like to think of myself as one of the foremost authorities on the subject of Nuka-World.

String.Source: If I knew that, I'd already have some by now! It's got to be around here somewhere, though. This is Nuka-World, after all!
String.Dest: If I knew that, I'd already have some by now! It's got to be around here somewhere, though. This is Nuka-World, after all!

String.Source: It's not that I don't want to tell you, it's just that I came all this way and I'd hate for someone else to beat me to it. Sorry!
String.Dest: It's not that I don't want to tell you, it's just that I came all this way and I'd hate for someone else to beat me to it. Sorry!

String.Source: Aren't they great? It was pretty clever, making them part of the...
String.Dest: Aren't they great? It was pretty clever, making them part of the...

String.Source: Wow, really? That's great! In fact, that gives me an idea!
String.Dest: Wow, really? That's great! In fact, that gives me an idea!

String.Source: I traveled all the way from the Capital Wasteland to visit this place.
String.Dest: I traveled all the way from the Capital Wasteland to visit this place.

String.Source: How about I give you a little tour of Nuka-Town here, and when it's over, I'll share my secret. What do you say?
String.Dest: How about I give you a little tour of Nuka-Town here, and when it's over, I'll share my secret. What do you say?

String.Source: Oh, okay. Lots of important stuff to do, I guess.
String.Dest: Oh, okay. Lots of important stuff to do, I guess.

String.Source: So, is that a yes?
String.Dest: So, is that a yes?

String.Source: Well, okay. It's too bad, I really miss that flavor.
String.Dest: Well, okay. It's too bad, I really miss that flavor.

String.Source: Nice try, but you just said you didn't like Nuka-Cola. I'm not that easy to fool!
String.Dest: Nice try, but you just said you didn't like Nuka-Cola. I'm not that easy to fool!

String.Source: I don't really want to say. It's nothing personal, I just don't know you well enough to trust you. Sorry!
String.Dest: I don't really want to say. It's nothing personal, I just don't know you well enough to trust you. Sorry!

String.Source: I hope you find that Nuka-Cola Quartz soon. I'm getting thirsty.
String.Dest: I hope you find that Nuka-Cola Quartz soon. I'm getting thirsty.

String.Source: Can't wait to taste that Nuka-Cola Quartz again!
String.Dest: Can't wait to taste that Nuka-Cola Quartz again!

String.Source: So, getting back to the purpose for your visit here, what were you searching for?
String.Dest: So, getting back to the purpose for your visit here, what were you searching for?

String.Source: You might have seen the robot dressed like a big red Nuka-Cola bottle? That's N.I.R.A., the park's informational attendant.
String.Dest: You might have seen the robot dressed like a big red Nuka-Cola bottle? That's N.I.R.A., the park's informational attendant.

String.Source: Winning the games meant earning tickets you could spend to get all kinds of awesome Nuka-Cola merchandise.
String.Dest: Winning the games meant earning tickets you could spend to get all kinds of awesome Nuka-Cola merchandise.

String.Source: If I'd been around back then, I'd probably have spent a whole week in here trying to win all the prizes.
String.Dest: If I'd been around back then, I'd probably have spent a whole week in here trying to win all the prizes.

String.Source: Right! I promised I'd tell you, so here goes.
String.Dest: Right! I promised I'd tell you, so here goes.

String.Source: She might be the only one in the park who's as enthusiastic about Nuka-Cola as I am! Haha!
String.Dest: She might be the only one in the park who's as enthusiastic about Nuka-Cola as I am! Haha!

String.Source: That formula was one of the great mysteries of the soft drink world, and it would be the crown jewel of my collection.
String.Dest: Tato receptura byla jednou z největších záhad nealkoholických nápojů celém světě, a to by bylo klenotem mé sbírky.

String.Source: You know all that from memory?
String.Dest: You know all that from memory?

String.Source: The show was so popular, tickets would sell out months in advance.
String.Dest: The show was so popular, tickets would sell out months in advance.

String.Source: Some of the finest -- and most expensive -- dining in the park was found at Fizztop Grille, which you can see up on the mountain's slope.
String.Dest: Some of the finest -- and most expensive -- dining in the park was found at Fizztop Grille, which you can see up on the mountain's slope.

String.Source: Bradberton didn't just create soda formulas. He was a genius who invented all kinds of fantastic things.
String.Dest: Bradberton nevytvořil jen receptury sody. Byl to génius, který vynalezl všechny možné druhy fantastických věcí.

String.Source: Oh sure! I've spent most of my life reading everything I could get my hands on about Nuka-Cola, including Nuka-World!
String.Dest: Oh sure! I've spent most of my life reading everything I could get my hands on about Nuka-Cola, including Nuka-World!

String.Source: Of course, the Nuka-Cola Corporation never released official figures. but from everything I've read, I think that's a low estimate.
String.Dest: Of course, the Nuka-Cola Corporation never released official figures. but from everything I've read, I think that's a low estimate.

String.Source: it was widely believed that the park's average daily attendance numbered in the tens of thousands.
String.Dest: it was widely believed that the park's average daily attendance numbered in the tens of thousands.

String.Source: Now, I promised I'd tell you why I'm here, so I will.
String.Dest: Now, I promised I'd tell you why I'm here, so I will.

String.Source: It was my pleasure! Especially since none of the gangs wanted to hear any of that. Believe me, I tried.
String.Dest: It was my pleasure! Especially since none of the gangs wanted to hear any of that. Believe me, I tried.

String.Source: So, what do you think?
String.Dest: So, what do you think?

String.Source: That was very informative. Thank you.
String.Dest: That was very informative. Thank you.

String.Source: The Parlor wasn't just a dinner theater. It also hosted one of the park's most sought-after events, the Bottle and Cappy Show.
String.Dest: The Parlor wasn't just a dinner theater. It also hosted one of the park's most sought-after events, the Bottle and Cappy Show.

String.Source: The cafe was best known for its super-spicy Nuka-Blast Burger, which was so hot it was nicknamed "the A-bomb on a bun."
String.Dest: The cafe was best known for its super-spicy Nuka-Blast Burger, which was so hot it was nicknamed "the A-bomb on a bun."

String.Source: Of course. You've been very patient, and a deal's a deal.
String.Dest: Of course. You've been very patient, and a deal's a deal.

String.Source: All I really care about is getting my hands on the Nuka-Cola Formula. Any other inventions we find are yours to keep.
String.Dest: Všechno, na čem mi opravdu záleží, je dostat do rukou recepturu na Nuka-Colu. Jakékoliv další vynálezy, které najdeme, si můžeš ponechat.

String.Source: On the park's busiest days, the line to get into the cafe was said to stretch all the way to Fizztop Mountain!
String.Dest: On the park's busiest days, the line to get into the cafe was said to stretch all the way to Fizztop Mountain!

String.Source: No more dragging your feet. Tell me why you're here, and I mean now.
String.Dest: No more dragging your feet. Tell me why you're here, and I mean now.

String.Source: I said I'd tell you why I was here, so I will.
String.Dest: I said I'd tell you why I was here, so I will.

String.Source: This is so exciting!
String.Dest: This is so exciting!

String.Source: What on Earth? Wait... no... it can't be!
String.Dest: What on Earth? Wait... no... it can't be!

String.Source: Let's see where the hidden elevator goes!
String.Dest: Let's see where the hidden elevator goes!

String.Source: I sort of feel sorry for him.
String.Dest: I sort of feel sorry for him.

String.Source: Let's search carefully. I'm willing to bet this place has a few secrets, and they'll probably be well hidden.
String.Dest: Let's search carefully. I'm willing to bet this place has a few secrets, and they'll probably be well hidden.

String.Source: Look in, around and behind everything.
String.Dest: Look in, around and behind everything.

String.Source: Wow! What is this place? Let's take a closer look!
String.Dest: Wow! What is this place? Let's take a closer look!

String.Source: Look at that! Mister Bradberton, you were one sneaky devil.
String.Dest: Look at that! Mister Bradberton, you were one sneaky devil.

String.Source: I know that formula's here! I also know it'll be carefully concealed.
String.Dest: Vím, že receptura je tady! Také vím, že bude určitě pečlivě ukrytá.

String.Source: If you can help me get it, I promise it'll be worth your while.
String.Dest: If you can help me get it, I promise it'll be worth your while.

String.Source: Search carefully. What we're looking for might not be easy to find.
String.Dest: Search carefully. What we're looking for might not be easy to find.

String.Source: Can you imagine being trapped like that for centuries?
String.Dest: Can you imagine being trapped like that for centuries?

String.Source: The formula would be hidden somewhere. No way Bradberton would leave it out in the open.
String.Dest: Receptura musí být skryta někde tady. V žádném případě by ji Bradberton nenechal někde venku.

String.Source: I couldn't stand being a frozen head. How could I drink Nuka-Cola?
String.Dest: I couldn't stand being a frozen head. How could I drink Nuka-Cola?

String.Source: I just knew there'd be a secret elevator here!
String.Dest: I just knew there'd be a secret elevator here!

String.Source: That's it! The door's unlocked! Let's go inside!
String.Dest: That's it! The door's unlocked! Let's go inside!

String.Source: As long as one person in this world still enjoys Nuka-Cola, my legacy remains intact, no matter what I've been reduced to!
String.Dest: As long as one person in this world still enjoys Nuka-Cola, my legacy remains intact, no matter what I've been reduced to!

String.Source: I do not need some interloper to remind me of my greatest tragedy!
String.Dest: I do not need some interloper to remind me of my greatest tragedy!

String.Source: After you!
String.Dest: After you!

String.Source: What do you think's in here?
String.Dest: What do you think's in here?

String.Source: Who... who are you? I haven't seen a real human face in so long. I had given up all hope.
String.Dest: Who... who are you? I haven't seen a real human face in so long. I had given up all hope.

String.Source: He called it Project Cobalt. In exchange for my weapon design, he would give me access to life-extending technology.
String.Dest: He called it Project Cobalt. In exchange for my weapon design, he would give me access to life-extending technology.

String.Source: Oh, what's the use. Look at me. Look at me! I'm a monster, trapped in a prison of my own making.
String.Dest: Oh, what's the use. Look at me. Look at me! I'm a monster, trapped in a prison of my own making.

String.Source: That's John-Caleb Bradberton! Or at least, it's his head. Wow!
String.Dest: That's John-Caleb Bradberton! Or at least, it's his head. Wow!

String.Source: The formula's got to be past this door.
String.Dest: Receptura musí být za těmito dveřmi.

String.Source: If he lives, I don't get the prototype ammo. What can you offer to make this worth my while?
String.Dest: If he lives, I don't get the prototype ammo. What can you offer to make this worth my while?

String.Source: That's not happening. I want that experimental ammunition.
String.Dest: That's not happening. I want that experimental ammunition.

String.Source: What?! No!
String.Dest: Cože?! Ne!

String.Source: You can't kill him! He's a great man! He invented Nuka-Cola, the best thing in the world!
String.Dest: You can't kill him! He's a great man! He invented Nuka-Cola, the best thing in the world!

String.Source: Mister Bradberton wants to die because he's lonely, right?
String.Dest: Mister Bradberton wants to die because he's lonely, right?

String.Source: I've got a limited edition Nuka-Cola jumpsuit. It's really stylish, and not many were made.
String.Dest: I've got a limited edition Nuka-Cola jumpsuit. It's really stylish, and not many were made.

String.Source: Wait, wait, wait! I have an idea!
String.Dest: Wait, wait, wait! I have an idea!

String.Source: You've got a point, but I want compensation for the prototype ammo I won't be getting.
String.Dest: You've got a point, but I want compensation for the prototype ammo I won't be getting.

String.Source: It's one of my most treasured possessions, but... well... I'm willing to let you have it.
String.Dest: It's one of my most treasured possessions, but... well... I'm willing to let you have it.

String.Source: Yeah, but if I don't cut the power, then that door doesn't open and I don't get my prototype ammo.
String.Dest: Yeah, but if I don't cut the power, then that door doesn't open and I don't get my prototype ammo.

String.Source: A Nuka-Cola jumpsuit? Hah! That's a paltry prize compared to what I'm offering.
String.Dest: A Nuka-Cola jumpsuit? Hah! That's a paltry prize compared to what I'm offering.

String.Source: Well, maybe I could stay with him. You know, keep him company, give him someone to talk to. He's like a hero to me.
String.Dest: Well, maybe I could stay with him. You know, keep him company, give him someone to talk to. He's like a hero to me.

String.Source: The choice is yours, but I beg you to honor my wishes. There is noone else who can help me.
String.Dest: The choice is yours, but I beg you to honor my wishes. There is noone else who can help me.

String.Source: It seems both of us have become frozen.
String.Dest: It seems both of us have become frozen.

String.Source: Just... please... set me free at last. I can't bear this loneliness any longer.
String.Dest: Just... please... set me free at last. I can't bear this loneliness any longer.

String.Source: I can't believe he was alive all that time, stuck in that room. That must have been awful.
String.Dest: I can't believe he was alive all that time, stuck in that room. That must have been awful.

String.Source: Running out of steam? You should drink a Nuka-Cola! That always gets me going!
String.Dest: Running out of steam? You should drink a Nuka-Cola! That always gets me going!

String.Source: Thank you.
String.Dest: Děkuju ti.

String.Source: I admit I'm flattered by her admiration, but I'm so tired, in ways that words could not explain.
String.Dest: I admit I'm flattered by her admiration, but I'm so tired, in ways that words could not explain.

String.Source: I see. I can only hope your sense of compassion compels you to do the right thing. I've been a prisoner long enough.
String.Dest: I see. I can only hope your sense of compassion compels you to do the right thing. I've been a prisoner long enough.

String.Source: I'm going to see what else I can find in this place to add to my collection.
String.Dest: I'm going to see what else I can find in this place to add to my collection.

String.Source: Young lady, you don't know what a torment it is, being trapped here alone and staring at the same wall, decade after decade.
String.Dest: Young lady, you don't know what a torment it is, being trapped here alone and staring at the same wall, decade after decade.

String.Source: I'm not shutting off the power. With Sierra to keep you company, I think you'll both be happier.
String.Dest: I'm not shutting off the power. With Sierra to keep you company, I think you'll both be happier.

String.Source: I wish you could have given me more time with Bradberton before you cut the power.
String.Dest: I wish you could have given me more time with Bradberton before you cut the power.

String.Source: I'm such a fool for taking him at his word. He never told me that this would be the price!
String.Dest: I'm such a fool for taking him at his word. He never told me that this would be the price!

String.Source: Guess I'll be heading home soon. Not much left for me here.
String.Dest: Guess I'll be heading home soon. Not much left for me here.

String.Source: Like a fool, I leapt before I looked. I've certainly paid the price for my short-sightedness.
String.Dest: Like a fool, I leapt before I looked. I've certainly paid the price for my short-sightedness.

String.Source: He'd taken a keen interest in my quantum mechanics research, and offered me a trade.
String.Dest: Byl nadšený z mého výzkumu kvantové mechaniky a nabídl mi obchod.

String.Source: My name's Sierra, sir. I'm your biggest admirer! I love Nuka-Cola more than anything. This is such an honor!
String.Dest: My name's Sierra, sir. I'm your biggest admirer! I love Nuka-Cola more than anything. This is such an honor!

String.Source: I can't believe someone as smart as Mister Bradberton would be fooled into thinking you could live forever. I guess he was terrified of growing old.
String.Dest: I can't believe someone as smart as Mister Bradberton would be fooled into thinking you could live forever. I guess he was terrified of growing old.

String.Source: I made a devil's bargain, though I didn't know it at the time.
String.Dest: I made a devil's bargain, though I didn't know it at the time.

String.Source: I await your decision.
String.Dest: I await your decision.

String.Source: I'm almost afraid to ask, but... what's your decision?
String.Dest: I'm almost afraid to ask, but... what's your decision?

String.Source: Oh my God! It's alive! He's alive!
String.Dest: Oh my God! It's alive! He's alive!

String.Source: I'll do it. I'll shut off the power.
String.Dest: I'll do it. I'll shut off the power.

String.Source: When the power is cut, the door to the prototype storage room will open automatically. Take anything you want. I don't care anymore.
String.Dest: When the power is cut, the door to the prototype storage room will open automatically. Take anything you want. I don't care anymore.

String.Source: Some people say I can be a little overwhelming... is that why you've stopped talking?
String.Dest: Some people say I can be a little overwhelming... is that why you've stopped talking?

String.Source: I've lived far too long already, and I'm prepared to move on.
String.Dest: I've lived far too long already, and I'm prepared to move on.

String.Source: Finally... free at last...
String.Dest: Finally... free at last...

String.Source: No! Mister Bradberton... I'm sorry.
String.Dest: No! Mister Bradberton... I'm sorry.

String.Source: You bitch! You said you'd let Bradberton live! You're going to pay for that!
String.Dest: You bitch! You said you'd let Bradberton live! You're going to pay for that!

String.Source: You asshole! You said you'd let Bradberton live! You're going to pay for that!
String.Dest: You asshole! You said you'd let Bradberton live! You're going to pay for that!

String.Source: I realize my appearance is disturbing, but do try to focus.
String.Dest: I realize my appearance is disturbing, but do try to focus.

String.Source: Now please do get on with it. I'm ready. I've been ready for a long, long time.
String.Dest: Now please do get on with it. I'm ready. I've been ready for a long, long time.

String.Source: Someday, I should write a book about all this. And before you ask, yes, you'll be a big part of the story.
String.Dest: Someday, I should write a book about all this. And before you ask, yes, you'll be a big part of the story.

String.Source: I realize that what I'm asking isn't easy, but there's something in it for you.
String.Dest: I realize that what I'm asking isn't easy, but there's something in it for you.

String.Source: So. Have you made up your mind?
String.Dest: So. Have you made up your mind?

String.Source: Maybe you did the right thing. I don't know. I feel so conflicted about all of this.
String.Dest: Maybe you did the right thing. I don't know. I feel so conflicted about all of this.

String.Source: The inventor of Nuka-Cola... that was the opportunity of a lifetime. Emphasis on "was".
String.Dest: The inventor of Nuka-Cola... that was the opportunity of a lifetime. Emphasis on "was".

String.Source: I haven't decided yet.
String.Dest: Ještě nevím, jak se rozhodnu.

String.Source: What about Sierra's offer to keep you company? Wouldn't that help?
String.Dest: What about Sierra's offer to keep you company? Wouldn't that help?

String.Source: What?! Will you not respect the wishes of a man who has suffered the way I have? Please, I beg you to reconsider!
String.Dest: What?! Will you not respect the wishes of a man who has suffered the way I have? Please, I beg you to reconsider!

String.Source: Now please shut up while I talk to your more rational friend here
String.Dest: Now please shut up while I talk to your more rational friend here

String.Source: In exchange for my assistance on a top-secret weapons project, he gave me access to an experimental process tthat would artificially extend my life.
String.Dest: In exchange for my assistance on a top-secret weapons project, he gave me access to an experimental process tthat would artificially extend my life.

String.Source: Yay! You're the best! Thank you so much!
String.Dest: Yay! You're the best! Thank you so much!

String.Source: Since you clearly don't care, then there's nothing more to talk about!
String.Dest: Since you clearly don't care, then there's nothing more to talk about!

String.Source: I'll take you to some of the best spots right here in Nuka-Town U.S.A. and show you just how amazing this place really is.
String.Dest: I'll take you to some of the best spots right here in Nuka-Town U.S.A. and show you just how amazing this place really is.

String.Source: I said I'd tell you why I was here, so I will.
String.Dest: I said I'd tell you why I was here, so I will.

String.Source: Here you go, one crisp and refreshing Nuka-Cola Quartz.
String.Dest: Here you go, one crisp and refreshing Nuka-Cola Quartz.

String.Source: Hello again! Yes, I'm still here and still searching.
String.Dest: Hello again! Yes, I'm still here and still searching.

String.Source: Are you really sure that you want to die?
String.Dest: Are you really sure that you want to die?

String.Source: But what if... no. You're right. I'm thinking only about myself. About what I wanted.
String.Dest: But what if... no. You're right. I'm thinking only about myself. About what I wanted.

String.Source: What he needed... I hadn't thought of it that way.
String.Dest: What he needed... I hadn't thought of it that way.

String.Source: I commend your diligence. It can't have been easy to find your way in here.
String.Dest: I commend your diligence. It can't have been easy to find your way in here.

String.Source: He made a choice, and I respected that choice. You should, too.
String.Dest: He made a choice, and I respected that choice. You should, too.

String.Source: I've had plenty of time to think about it.
String.Dest: I've had plenty of time to think about it.

String.Source: He was trapped and alone for centuries, and I set him free from that hell. I did the right thing.
String.Dest: He was trapped and alone for centuries, and I set him free from that hell. I did the right thing.

String.Source: That was quite an adventure, wasn't it?
String.Dest: That was quite an adventure, wasn't it?

String.Source: Still... I can't overlook the fact that, for one glorious, shining moment I, got to meet the man who invented Nuka-Cola.
String.Dest: Still... I can't overlook the fact that, for one glorious, shining moment I, got to meet the man who invented Nuka-Cola.

String.Source: Well... maybe you're right. I guess I didn't consider his feelings as much as I should have.
String.Dest: Well... maybe you're right. I guess I didn't consider his feelings as much as I should have.

String.Source: Help yourself to anything that you think is useful. None of it means much to me anymore.
String.Dest: Help yourself to anything that you think is useful. None of it means much to me anymore.

String.Source: I want you to shut off the power to this machine that's keeping me alive. I want to die.
String.Dest: I want you to shut off the power to this machine that's keeping me alive. I want to die.

String.Source: Then I trust you will honor my wish.
String.Dest: Then I trust you will honor my wish.

String.Source: Come on, you're a disembodied head trapped in a vault. You've got so much to live for!
String.Dest: Come on, you're a disembodied head trapped in a vault. You've got so much to live for!

String.Source: Who the hell are you to just walk in here and destroy all that?
String.Dest: Who the hell are you to just walk in here and destroy all that?

String.Source: I'm pleased to know that even now, the legacy of my work is still appreciated. Sierra has made that very clear to me.
String.Dest: I'm pleased to know that even now, the legacy of my work is still appreciated. Sierra has made that very clear to me.

String.Source: I'll never forget that. Not ever. And it wouldn't have been possible without your help. Thank you.
String.Dest: I'll never forget that. Not ever. And it wouldn't have been possible without your help. Thank you.

String.Source: That's easy for you to say, standing there on your own two legs, able to go where you wish and do what you want.
String.Dest: That's easy for you to say, standing there on your own two legs, able to go where you wish and do what you want.

String.Source: Despite your obvious sarcasm, you clearly recognize my situation for the living hell that it is.
String.Dest: Despite your obvious sarcasm, you clearly recognize my situation for the living hell that it is.

String.Source: To get an opportunity like that and then have it snatched away... it hit me pretty hard.
String.Dest: To get an opportunity like that and then have it snatched away... it hit me pretty hard.

String.Source: I... I guess so.
String.Dest: I... I guess so.

String.Source: You can't know how wonderful a real conversation can be until you've gone without one for a few hundred years.
String.Dest: You can't know how wonderful a real conversation can be until you've gone without one for a few hundred years.

String.Source: Genius is restless, madam! It must expand, seek new challenges, and explore new frontiers. So yes, a weapon.
String.Dest: Genius is restless, madam! It must expand, seek new challenges, and explore new frontiers. So yes, a weapon.

String.Source: There's got to be a better solution than killing you.
String.Dest: There's got to be a better solution than killing you.

String.Source: Just... please think carefully. If you shut off the power, there's no going back or changing your mind.
String.Dest: Just... please think carefully. If you shut off the power, there's no going back or changing your mind.

String.Source: Yeah, if our places were reversed, I'd probably want the same thing.
String.Dest: Yeah, if our places were reversed, I'd probably want the same thing.

String.Source: I know you're disappointed, Sierra, but ask yourself - what was best for him?
String.Dest: I know you're disappointed, Sierra, but ask yourself - what was best for him?

String.Source: It's just that... Never, not in my wildest dreams, did I think I'd get the chance to talk to Mister Bradberton in person.
String.Dest: It's just that... Never, not in my wildest dreams, did I think I'd get the chance to talk to Mister Bradberton in person.

String.Source: I won't deny that it's nice to have some company again.
String.Dest: I won't deny that it's nice to have some company again.

String.Source: You're being selfish, Sierra. This wasn't about what you wanted, it was about what he needed.
String.Dest: You're being selfish, Sierra. This wasn't about what you wanted, it was about what he needed.

String.Source: This trip was totally worth it. I'm so glad I came here.
String.Dest: This trip was totally worth it. I'm so glad I came here.

String.Source: Please... think carefully. Don't rush your decision.
String.Dest: Please... think carefully. Don't rush your decision.

String.Source: Now this looks interesting. Come on!
String.Dest: Now this looks interesting. Come on!
